table.name: vtiger_solaryposition
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solaryposition` ( `solarypositionid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `solaryposition` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`solarypositionid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_solarypositioncf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solarypositioncf` ( `solarypositionid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`solarypositionid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
